attributes.action: stop schools dictating everything our children do and stop them infringing on their human rights just because they are children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parents should have more say in how they bring their children up, instead of schools dictating what they can and cannot eat especially in special needs children! Parents should also have the right to take 1 annual holiday when (in or out of term time) and where they choose without reprecussions for doing so.

rejection.details:
Your title is too vague and does not make a specific call for action.
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
If your petition is specifically about school holidays then please note it is a duplicate of http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/schooltermhols/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
